releaseNotes: 🔧 NEW: Fix Calculator - Recalculate all shifts based on assigned shift durations
🔄 NEW: Shift Change functionality in Team Shifts - Change shifts directly from monthly shifts table
📅 NEW: Bulk Assignment in Shift Management - Assign shifts for entire months with one click
⏰ NEW: Automatic Friday Day Off - Set Fridays as day off automatically in bulk assignments
🎯 NEW: Real-time shift duration calculations - Uses actual shift start/end times from database
💡 NEW: Auto-recalculation of regular/overtime hours when shifts are changed
🛡️ Enhanced permission system - Content & Creative Managers can now edit events and Q&A
📊 Improved shift management efficiency - Bulk operations save hours of manual work
